MAIN.EXIT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Do you really want to leave Osm Go!?

LOGIN.SAVED_PASSWORD_HINT: Your password will be saved in cleartext in the application cache.
LOGIN.NOT_SAVED_PASSWORD_HINT: You will be asked for your password before each OSM update.

SEND_DATA.YOU_MUST_BE_LOGGED_IN: Please log in to upload your changes to OSM.
SEND_DATA.NAME: Name

SETTINGS.POSITION_TRACKING_HINT: The map is centered at your location.
SETTINGS.ORIENTATION_TRACKING_HINT: The orientation of the map depends on the phone.
SETTINGS.HIDE_LARGE_POLYGON_HINT: Polygons larger than 5000m² won't be displayed. A marker will always represent the polygon.
SETTINGS.HIDE_LONG_LINE_HINT: Lines longer than 200m won't be displayed. A marker will always represent the line.
SETTINGS.MARGIN_HINT: Distance around the current view where the data will be downloaded.
SETTINGS.TAG_COUNTRY_HINT: Tags and presets may vary by country.
SETTINGS.DELETE_CACHE_HINT: Delete all application cache (data, edits, login, etc.).
SETTINGS.DISPLAY_OLD_TAGS_ICON: Show an icon on old objects
SETTINGS.OLD_TAGS_ICON_HINT: If the object is older, display a small icon to the left of the marker on the map.
SETTINGS.DISPLAY_FIXME_ICON_HINT: Displays an icon to the right of the marker to indicate the presence of a fixed tag.
SETTINGS.ADD_SURVEY_DATE_HINT: Add today's date to tag 'survey:date' or 'check_date' after adding or editing an object.
SETTINGS.LINES_SELECTABLE_HINT: Ability to click on a line to open the element sheet.
SETTINGS.POLYGONS_SELECTABLE_HINT: Ability to click on a polygon to open the element sheet.
SETTINGS.CENTER_WHEN_GPS_IS_READY: On start, center the map on your location
SETTINGS.CENTER_WHEN_GPS_IS_READY_HINT: Center the map on your location as soon as possible.

MODAL_SELECTED_ITEM.SEARCH_TAG_AT_LEAST_3_LETTERS: Please enter at least 3 characters in the search bar
MODAL_SELECTED_ITEM.THIS_NODE_IS_USED_BY_A_WAY: This node is used by {x} way(s)

MANAGE_TAGS.ACTIVE_TAGS_DESCRIPTION: This window allows you to hide certain items on the map or add favourites.
MANAGE_TAGS.HIDDEN_TAGS_WARNING: Hidden elements are not rendered on the map and are not proposed in the tag list. Use with caution to avoid duplicates.
MANAGE_TAGS.HIDDEN_TAGS_DESCRIPTION: This window allows you to make the hidden elements visible.
MANAGE_TAGS.BOOKMARKED_TAGS_DESCRIPTION: This window allows you to manage your favorite tags.
